div.div: Ohio Wesleyan Univ. vs. College of Wooster
at Wooster, Ohio | John P. Papp Stadium

tr.td: Wooster wins the coin toss, defers to the second half.
Trevor Bowden kickoff 53 yards to the OWU12, Jerry Harper return 18 yards to the OWU30 (Nate Huwar), PENALTY WOO offside 5 yards to the OWU35, 1st and 10, OWU ball on OWU35.
Jesse Beachy rush for 2 yards to the OWU37 (Ben Kumpf;Aaron Roberson).
Jesse Beachy rush for 1 yard to the OWU38 (Ben Kumpf).
Dominick Orsini pass incomplete to Tim Shadoan.
Rich Poutier punt 33 yards to the WOO29, Tyson Vogel return 0 yards to the WOO29, fumble by Tyson Vogel recovered by OWU Doug Sanders at WOO21.
OHIO WESLEYAN UNIV. drive start at 13:41.
Dominick Orsini pass complete to David Pugh for loss of 1 yard to the WOO22 (Ethan Nichol).
Jesse Beachy rush for 1 yard to the WOO21 (Ben Kumpf;Riley Markko).
Dominick Orsini pass incomplete to Eugene Coleman.
Nolan Kovach field goal attempt from 38 GOOD, clock 12:15.
